alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Tonopah Desert (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 7:24PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 830 PM MST... At 724 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles east of Sundad, or 24 miles northwest of Gila Bend, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sundad, Painted Rock Dam and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
